Great casual atmosphere and really good contemporary Italian food.  Busy restaurant, so make sure you make a reservation.  Asparagus salad was to die for.  Other dishes were good too - pappardelle, pork shoulder, chicken.  The ingredients were fresh and local.  Our server did not speak English, but menu was available in English and easy to navigate.  Restaurant was a block off of La Rambla Catalunya and not touristy.  Had local feel.
